reviews.review: fun to learn. makes you better at fps
Awesome and Legendary game. Been playing Counter Strike for 25 years now
Simplemente un juego de mierda in-jugable
Great game. One of the best first person shooters ever. Difficult learning curve but overall very worth it.

Es el Counter 1.6, pero mejorado!!. Tiene mejores gráficos.
Además se pueden bajar los mapas clásicos totalmente remasterizados en el Workshop de la comunidad. 10 puntos!.
Not sure if I love this game or hate it
Böyle oyunun amk hile açanların da amına koyayım
É um ótimo jogo de igualdade , e o ponto negativo é que nunca se sabe quantas vitórias serão necessárias para passar de Patente
Oyun fizik açısından çok iyi grafiklerde çok iyi tevsiye ediyorum.
Its counterstrike of course its fun :)
I've been playing for years only 500 hours but years later and i'm still stuck in silver. 10/10 best game ever if you love being stuck at the lowest rank in a game.
it's free but sometimes you'll encounter a hacker
I think thisgame is very good. I enjoy it alot

Counter-Strike serüvenime taaaa 1.5 zamanı başladım. Ardından 1.6 ve şimdi CS:GO ile devam etmekteyim.Bu oyun benim herşeyim fakat gelen hileler beni aşırı bunaltıyor. Sunucunun uzak olması ve official serverların 64-bit olması beni üzüyor ama yapacak birşey yok, devam.....
Узнал как дела у моей мамы
7/10 would rate it more. but the older version was better
This game grows on you like a cancerous tumor

Recently got back into this game until I lost a 1v5 where I got 3 kills but sadly died and was immediately kicked which then reminded me I hate this game
I dont encounter very many cheaters and the game is very addicting and will have me playing for hours

I have thoroughly enjoyed my 250 hours of CSGO gameplay,  will continue wasting precious hours of my youth practicing crosshair placement and smokes on dust 2. What's interesting is that most of my time in game is spent in the aim arena.
